```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
data(gapminder_unfiltered)
```

Set the data
```{r}
# new comment
gapminder_unfiltered %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  filter(lifeExp == max(lifeExp)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(year, country, lifeExp) %>%
  arrange(year) ->
  sumdat
sumdat
```
